If you are breastfeeding keep a 
food diary to see if anything in 
particular that you are eating is 
upsetting your baby.
Colic
Colic is the term used when a 
baby cries a lot but there is no 
obvious cause. All babies cry 
but your baby may have  colic if 
they cry more than three hours 
a day, three days a week for at 
least one week.
